functionDecorators.name: setIssuanceRatio
functionDecorators.description: Set the issuanceRatio for issuance calculations. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: nominateNewOwner
functionDecorators.description: Nominate a new owner of this contract. Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.

functionDecorators.name: incrementTotalIssuerCount
functionDecorators.description: Increment the total issuer count. Only the associated contract may call this.

functionDecorators.name: appendDebtLedgerValue
functionDecorators.description: Append a value to the debt ledger. Only the associated contract may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The new value to be added to the debt ledger.

functionDecorators.name: lastDebtLedgerEntry
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the most recent entry from the debt ledger.

functionDecorators.name: setPreferredCurrency
functionDecorators.description: Set preferred currency for a user. Only the associated contract may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The account to set the preferred currency for.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Accept the nomination to be owner.

functionDecorators.name: importIssuerData
functionDecorators.description: Import issuer data from the old Shadows contract before multicurrency. Only callable by the contract owner, and only for 1 week after deployment.

functionDecorators.name: setCurrentIssuanceData
functionDecorators.description: Set issuance data for an address. Only the associated contract may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address to set the data for.

parameterDecorators.name: initialDebtOwnership
parameterDecorators.description: The initial debt ownership for this address.

functionDecorators.name: clearIssuanceData
functionDecorators.description: Clear issuance data for an address. Only the associated contract may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address to clear the data for.

functionDecorators.name: hasIssued
functionDecorators.description: Query whether an account has issued and has an outstanding debt balance.

functionDecorators.name: decrementTotalIssuerCount
functionDecorators.description: Decrement the total issuer count. Only the associated contract may call this.

functionDecorators.name: debtLedgerLength
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the length of the debt ledger array.
